name: get_equity_latest_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool investing_financial_stocks.
Tool description: get all investing.com stocks realtime data in multi language and filters
API description: Fetches the latest equity data for a given equity slug.

slug.description: The unique identifier for the equity, retrieved from screener results.

lang.description: Language code for the data. Defaults to 'en'.
